import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css'; import logo from '../Assets/logo.png' import '../OfferRide/style.css' import { Container, Row, Col, Card } from "react-bootstrap"; import { faFontAwesome } from "@fortawesome/free-regular-svg-icons"; import axios from "axios"; const OfferRide: React.FC = () => { const [userFromCity, setuserFromCity] = useState("Select"); const [fromCities, setfromCities] = useState([]); const [userToCity, setuserToCity] = useState("Select"); const [toCities, settoCities] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { const getCities = async () => { await axios.get('https://localhost:7243/api/OfferRide/api/OfferRide/TotalCities') .then((response) => { setfromCities(response.data) settoCities(response.data) }) .catch((error) => { console.log(error); }) } getCities(); }, []) /*function to get all the cities*/ function displayFromCities() { var str = []; for (var k = 0; k < (fromCities).length; k++) { console.log(k) str.push() } return str; } function displayToCities() { var str = []; for (var k = 0; k < (toCities).length; k++) { console.log(k) str.push() } return str; } return (
